Dreams aren't achieved in leaps and bounds they are journeys that require you to put one foot in front of the other and start walking.
People waste too much time looking for purpose, reinvest that time in creating and building your purpose.
Keep moving forward no matter how hard life is, no matter how bad the pain gets because your a champions, you keep going when others give up
When your tired, in pain and can't feel that you can't continue that's when doors will start opening for you.
